data.title: Discounted computers and phones - Tech
data.meta_description: Find sources for affordable refurbished laptops, desktops, flat screens, tablets, and smart phones.
data.text:
The LifeLine program is a federal program that offers up to $9.25 a month off phone, internet or bundled phone and internet services. To learn more and apply visit LifeLine Support

You qualify for Lifeline if your household income is up to 135% of the Federal Poverty Guidelines or if you or someone in your household participates in certain federal assistance programs like SNAP and Medicaid.
